summary: A 10 year old girl lives in post WWII rural France with her parents, who are about to divorce. Her older sister leaves home to finish school, and the young girl is left with a mysterious, ... See full summary »
cast: Alba Gaïa Bellugi|Stéphane Freiss|Maria de Medeiros|Yolande Moreau|Benjamin Ramon|Lauriane Sire|Olivier Cruveiller|Virgil Leclaire|Daniel Znyk|Jean-Paul Rouvray|Patrick Pierron
title: Je m'appelle Elisabeth
